bio.p: Sako Mirzaie is a visiting Professor in the Leslie Dan Faculty of Pharmacy at the University of Toronto. He is an Assistant Professor at Azad University of Sanandaj. Sako received his Ph.D. in Biochemistry from the science and research branch, Azad University of Tehran. His research interests lie in the area of protein engineering, drug design, and discovery. Sako has collaborated actively with researchers in several other disciplines of biological science. He has more than 40 papers in high-ranked international journals.
